-Add parsing of independent padding attributes
-Update CHANGELOG

title: Add parsing of independent padding attributes
message:
Add parsing of independent padding attributes

- Allows paddingLeft and paddingRight to be set separately
- For existing apps that _only_ specify left or right, they must add
the other property for no change to be effected
- For existing apps that specify the same padding for left and
right, they needn't do anything to maintain behaviour
- For existing apps that specify different values for left and right
padding, they must increase the smaller padding to match the
higher one to maintain behaviour
- For existing apps that use `app:pstsPaddingMiddle="true"`
no change is required to maintain behaviour (this seems to
override the padding values anyway)

Specify type/packaging for support-v4 dependency

This will result in "<type>aar</type>" to be added to the support-v4 dependency declaration in library pom when pushing to Maven Central (or another maven repo). This fixes #37. Tested using gradle-mvn-push pushing to an artifactory server.

Signed-off-by: Matthias Stevens <matthias.stevens@gmail.com>

title: Fix tabsContainer always have to be as wide as the parent
message:
Fix tabsContainer always have to be as wide as the parent

If we used manual padding, ex: paddingLeft=72dp and the content wasn't as wide as the HorizontalScrollView we were getting a tab cut and the text finished with ellipse.
So now:
 - tabs container is always as big as the HorizontalScrollView
 - setClipChildren is always set to false

title: Update default library state to material design
message:
Update default library state to material design

New look and feel of the library that follows material design
guidelines. This update of the library introduce:

- Change the default parameters of the tabs layout to make
it look like more material.

- The indicator is center by default while swiping tabs.

- The alpha value of the titles change depending the
selected position.

- Ability to change the divider width (No material change).

- Ability to pass customTabs implementing the interface
'CustomTabProvider' in your adapter (dev can use ripple
effect on the tabs).In case the customTab have
a view with id '@+id/tab_title', it will be use to place
the title and alpha will act as usual. If this interface is
not implemented then, the default Tab layout will be use (TextView).

title: Observe adapter dataset and notify View of changes
message:
Observe adapter dataset and notify View of changes

If the adapter's dataset changes, this View does not reflect the changes
before onPageScrolled is called. This causes an NPE because
tabsContainer has no children. With this fix, the view is now synced
with the ViewPager's adapter (the correct tabs are present) and
tabsContainer#getChildAt will no longer throw an NPE.

Fixes #66
